Room.Name: Jactac's Home in the Trees
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large bird house hanging in the trees.
Room.LongDescription: You have to stoop to avoid the ceiling, but other than that the place is rather large and airy. It's a little dirty, however. There are piles of trash in every corner, and even the remains of a dead mouse. Odd trinkets are scattered in the room, and a broken mirror hangs from a string in the center of the room. This is the home of Jactac, the largest and wisest old raven in the enchanted forest.
